text: Knema malayana is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree found in Peninsular Malaysia, Singapore, and Thailand. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Knema malayana. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
